thread.title: Patralekhaa attends special screening of 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2' in Mumbai
thread.title_full: Patralekhaa attends special screening of 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2' in Mumbai - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Patralekhaa attends special screening of 'Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2' in Mumbai
text:
The cast and crew of Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2 (PKP2) hosted a special screening of their film, which is all set to hit screens today.
The movie, presented by Viacom18 Motion Pictures and produced by Panorama Studios, has already generated curiosity for its wacky promos and quirky dialogues. Mustan and Hussain Burmawala, Arjan Bajwa, Luv Sinha and Patralekhaa, who were among those spotted at the screening, also had nice things to say about PKP2.
Kartik Aaryan, Omkar Kapoor, Sunny Singh, Nushrat Bharucha, Ishita Raj and Sonnalli Seygall, who play the leads in the film, posed happily for the shutterbugs. While director Luv Ranjan was conspicuous by his absence at the screening, his producer Abhishek Pathak more than made up for it by playing the perfect host.
